channel.title: MeloCraft NEW SERVER PvP FACTIONS
channel.description:
Hello Everyone ! :) Welcome to MeloCraft PvP!
We are a fairly new pvp server using factions for improved pvp!
We are also looking for staff currently.
This server is for people who know how to play and are looking for some heated battles! Join at 96.9.178.42:25599 ;D
